articles.description: At least eight vehicles were damaged and more than a dozen people injured in a serial accident near Hoskote toll booth early on Sunday. A speeding truck hit the vehicles waiting at the toll booth around 6.45am. All the damaged vehicles were moving towards Hos…

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: 7 dead as MUV falls into stream near Belagavi
articles.description: Seven labourers were killed on the spot and 14 others injured after the multi-utility vehicle (MUV) they were travelling in fell into the Ballari Nala near Kanabargi, on the outskirts of the city, on Sunday morning.

articles.author: Petlee Peter
articles.title: Passport validity: Bengalurean detained in Kuala Lumpur
articles.description: A Bengaluru couple's holiday turned a nightmare after the man was detained by authorities at Kuala Lumpur airport when it was found that his passport had under two months' validity.

articles.author: Kevin Mendonsa
articles.title: Puttur Block education officer gets Dalit student's family a house
articles.description: Moved by the plight of a bright Dalit student during his house visits, Puttur block education officer (BEO) C Lokesh roped in individuals and various organisations to help build a house for a student's family. The house, which is 85% complete, will be handed …

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: In first meet with Argentina President, PM Modi discusses food security, ways to boost ties
articles.description: In their first bilateral meet in Munich, PM Modi and Argentinian President Alberto Fernandez discussed issues ranging from trade and investment, defence cooperation, agriculture and food security to traditional medicine and cultural cooperation.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Man goes fishing at Powai lake, gets bitten by crocodile
articles.description: A 40-year-old tribal man, Vijay Kakve, had a lucky escape after he was attacked by a crocodile. Kakve was seriously injured as the crocodile bit his foot while he was fishing at Powai lake on Saturday.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Dead fetuses found in stream were all male, says forensic science laboratory report
articles.description: The seven fetuses found dumped in a dried-up stream on Friday were all male fetuses, forensic tests have shown, reports Ravindra Uppar.

articles.author: George Mendonca
articles.title: Cable operator, 38, dies in blaze after saving his 3 kids
articles.description: A 38-year-old cable operator who had a passion for acting died in a blaze in his bungalow in Panvel's Akurli village on Sunday morning.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: To counter China, US to fund G7 initiative in India
articles.description: To counter China's flagship trade-and-infrastructure initiative, US President Joe Biden and other G7 leaders formally launched in Germany the Partnership for Global Infrastructure (PGII), after an earlier campaign faltered.

articles.author: Malathy Iyer
articles.title: Covid claims 5 lives in city in 24 hours, June toll 33
articles.description: Covid-19 claimed five lives in Mumbai in a 24-hour period-higher than the total toll for March (4) and April (4) and equal to May's Covid fatalities.

articles.author: Sandeep Moudgal
articles.title: Karnataka govt may defer ZP, TP polls
articles.description: Facing a stiff challenge of completing the process of determining reservation for OBCs and completing delimitation of wards across the existing 30 ZPs and 176 TPs, the Karnataka government may defer these polls to beyond the assembly elections which is likely…

articles.title: बुलडोजर, मैनेजमेंट और सेंधमारी... आजमगढ़ कैसे हार बैठे अखिलेश यादव? जानें वजहें
articles.description: रामपुर में बीजेपी जहां चौथी बार जीती है, वहीं आजमगढ़ में उसे दूसरी बार जीत मिली है। आजमगढ़ में बीएसपी के शाह आलम उर्फ गुड्डू जमाली ने भी कड़ी टक्कर दी, लेकिन तीसरे पर रहे। इस जीत के साथ ही लोकसभा में यूपी से बीजेपी गठबंधन की 66 सीटें हो गई हैं।

articles.title: Shinde & rebel MLAs move SC; pleas to be heard today
articles.description: Rebel leader Eknath Shinde on Sunday took his battle against Shiv Sena to the Supreme Court and filed a petition on three counts - challenging the disqualification notice served on 16 legislators, the appointment of Ajay Choudhary as leader of Shiv Sena legis…

articles.author: Priyanka Kakodkar,Chaitanya Marpakwar
articles.title: Now, 8th min jumps ship; only 3 Sena men left in Uddhav cabinet
articles.description: With the Shiv Sena on the warpath in a bid to reclaim the party, the rebel Eknath Shinde faction retaliated strongly on Sunday bringing higher education minister Uday Samant over to Guwahati to join the coup. The rebel camp also moved the Supreme Court agains…

articles.author: Ambarish Mishra
articles.title: Provocative speeches hint street violence may aggravate crisis
articles.description: Sainiks came out on the streets in Thane, Navi Mumbai, Pune, Palghar, Parbhani, Satara, Nagpur and Nanded. A group of Sainiks allegedly attacked the central office of Shrikant Shinde in Ulhasnagar, it is learnt.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: People lost even right to life during Emergency: PM Modi
articles.description: ​Emergency was announced in the country on June 25, 1975, and lifted on March 21, 1977. Speaking about the Emergency, PM Narendra Modi on Sunday said it had been a “dark spot on the vibrant democracy of the country”.

articles.author: Mateen Hafeez
articles.title: Maharashtra political crisis: Keep central forces ready, says governor, seeks more cover for rebels
articles.description: At least 15 Sena MLAs from the Eknath Shinde camp, including four from the city, have been provided Y+ security cover by the CRPF amid reports of violence and protests.
articles.content: Why this Shiv Sena's revolt is worse than the past onesShiv Sainiks have challenged their high command in the past, but this time theres a difference which is why it's likely to be fatal

articles.description: Bhojpuri actor Dinesh Lal Yadav alias Nirahua won Azamgarh, vacated by Akhilesh, by just over 8,000 votes in a humdinger of a battle that kept see-sawing all day.

articles.author: Surendra Singh
articles.title: 100 space startups have come up in a few yrs; 750 students making 75 small satellites: PM Modi
articles.description: Hailing several big accomplishments in the space sector recently, Modi said, “One of the big achievements is the creation of an agency named In-Space, which is promoting and creating new opportunities for the private sector.”

articles.description: Ireland vs India, 1st T20I: भारत ने आयरलैंड के खिलाफ टी20 सीरीज की शुरुआत जीत के साथ की है। बारिश के प्रभावित 12-12 ओवर के इस पहले मुकाबले में भारत के सामने जीत के लिए 109 रनों का लक्ष्य था। टीम ने ताबड़तोड़ खेल दिखाते हुए 16 गेंद बाकी रहते जीत हासिल कर ली।

articles.description: On June 22, Bangladesh came up with a notification that allows imports of non-basmati rice till October 31. This is for the first time that Bangladesh has started importing rice from India so early as there is a fear that India might put a ban on rice exports.
